00037 #ifdef OS_VXWORKS
00038 #include "vxWorks.h"
00039 #include "vme.h"
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 #ifdef PPCxxx
00043 #define A32D24_1151            0xfa000000       /* A32D24_1151 access */
00044 #else
00045 #define A32D24_1151            0xf0000000       /* A32D24_1151 access */
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
00049 #define INLINE __inline
00050 #elif defined(__GNUC__)
00051 #define INLINE __inline__
00052 #else
00053 #define INLINE
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 #define EXTERNAL extern
00057 
00058 #ifndef MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED
00059 #define MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED
00060 
00061 typedef unsigned short int WORD;
00062 
00063 #ifdef __alpha
00064 typedef unsigned int DWORD;
00065 #else
00066 typedef unsigned long int DWORD;
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 #endif                          /* MIDAS_TYPE_DEFINED */
00070 
00071 /*-Macros--------------------------------------------------------*/
00072 #define LRS1151_READ(_vmebase,_d,_r){\
00073   {\
00074      volatile DWORD _ll, *_local, __r;\
00075         _ll = _vmebase;\
00076         _local = (DWORD *) (((_ll << 8) | 0x80) | A32D24_1151);\
00077         __r =_r;\
00078         if (__r > 16) __r = 16;\
00079         while (__r > 0) {\
00080                    *_d++ = *_local++;\
00081                    __r--;}\
00082         }\
00083   }
00084 
00085 #define LRS115_CLEAR(_vmebase){\
00086   {\
00087      volatile DWORD _ll, _dummy, *_local, __r=16;\
00088         _ll = _vmebase;\
00089         _local =(DWORD *)( ((_ll << 8) | 0x40) | A32D24_1151);\
00090         while (__r > 0) {\
00091                    _dummy = *_local;\
00092                    _local++;\
00093                    __r--;}\
00094         }\
00095   }
00096 
00097 /*-input---------------------------------------------------------*/
00098 INLINE void lrs1151_read(DWORD vmeBase, DWORD ** d, int r)
00099 {
00100    volatile DWORD *local;
00101 
00102    if (r > 16)
00103       r = 16;
00104    local = (DWORD *) (((vmeBase << 8) | 0x80) | A32D24_1151);
00105    while (r > 0) {
00106       *((*d)++) = *((DWORD *) local);
00107       local++;
00108       r--;
00109    }
00110 }
00111 
00112 /*-command-------------------------------------------------------*/
00113 INLINE void lrs1151_clear(DWORD vmeBase)
00114 {
00115    volatile DWORD *local, dummy, r;
00116 
00117    local = (DWORD *) (((vmeBase << 8) | 0x40) | A32D24_1151);
00118    for (r = 0; r < 16; r++) {
00119       dummy = *local++;
00120    }
00121 }
00122 
00123 void lrs1151(void)
00124 {
00125    printf("\n---> LeCroy 1151 16ch. NIM/ECL scalers <---\n");
00126    printf("Macro  : LRS1151_READ (DWORD base, DWORD *data, int repeat);\n");
00127    printf("Macro  : LRS1151_CLEAR (DWORD base);\n");
00128    printf("Inline : lrs1151_read  (DWORD base, DWORD *data, int repeat);\n");
00129    printf("Inline : lrs1151_clear (DWORD base);\n");
00130    printf("Test   : rd1151   (0x7a00)    <--- read    VME scaler\n");
00131    printf("Test   : clr1151  (0x7a00)    <--- clear   VME scaler\n");
00132 }
00133 
00134 void rd1151(DWORD vmeBase)
00135 {
00136    DWORD i, dd[16], *pdd;
00137    for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00138       dd[i] = 0;
00139    pdd = &dd[0];
00140    lrs1151_read(vmeBase, &pdd, 16);
00141    for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00142       printf("%i-> %8.8x\n", i, dd[i]);
00143 }
00144 
00145 void clr1151(DWORD vmeBase)
00146 {
00147    lrs1151_clear(vmeBase);
00148 }
